actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: Resolution disapproving of efforts to expel Israel from the United Nations.

summary.text: Expresses the House of Representatives' strong disapproval of efforts to suspend or expel Israel from the General Assembly of the United Nations or from the United Nations Organization. States that if Israel is suspended or expelled from the United Nations or the General Assembly, the United States should reassess its relationship to the United Nations Organization.

titles.title: Resolution disapproving of efforts to expel Israel from the United Nations.
